00001 #include <cassert>
00002 #include <iomanip>
00003 
00004 #include "SimConstants.hh"

00007 namespace TBTrack {
00008 
00009 SimConstants::SimConstants(int p) :
00010   AlnConstants(p,1), _period(p) {
00011 
00012   assert(sizeof(SimConstants)==
00013          sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00014          sizeof(float)*numberOfFloats+
00015          sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);
00016 
00017   if(_period==0) {
00018     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00019       for(unsigned layer(0);layer<4;layer++) {
00020         _cEffic[xy][layer]=0.7;
00021         _cNoise[xy][layer]=0.02;
00022         _cSmear[xy][layer]=0.4;
00023         _tTzero[xy][layer]=(9000.0-1000.0*layer)/300.0;
00024       }
00025     }
00026 
00027   
00028   } else {
00029     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00030       for(unsigned layer(0);layer<3;layer++) {
00031         _cEffic[xy][layer]=0.9;
00032         _cNoise[xy][layer]=0.01;
00033         _cSmear[xy][layer]=0.2;
00034         _tTzero[xy][layer]=(40000.0-1000.0*layer)/300.0;
00035       }
00036       _cEffic[xy][3]=0.0;
00037       _cNoise[xy][3]=0.0;
00038       _cSmear[xy][3]=0.0;
00039       _tTzero[xy][3]=0.0;
00040     }
00041   }
00042 }
00043 
00044 double SimConstants::cEffic(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00045   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00046   return _cEffic[d][l];
00047 }
00048 
00049 void SimConstants::cEffic(unsigned d, unsigned l, double e) {
00050   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00051   _cEffic[d][l]=e;
00052 }

00054 double SimConstants::cSmear(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00055   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00056   return _cSmear[d][l];
00057 }

00059 void SimConstants::cSmear(unsigned d, unsigned l, double s) {
00060   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00061   _cSmear[d][l]=s;
00062 }

00064 double SimConstants::cNoise(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {

00069 void SimConstants::cNoise(unsigned d, unsigned l, double n) {
00070   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);

00074 double SimConstants::tTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00075   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00076   return _tTzero[d][l];

00079 void SimConstants::tTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l, double t) {
00080   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00081   _tTzero[d][l]=t;
00082 }

00084 std::ostream& SimConstants::print(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00085   o << s << "SimConstants::print()" << std::endl;
00086   o << s << " Data period = " << _period << std::endl;
00087 
00088   AlnConstants::print(o,s+" ");
00089 
00090   for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00091     if(xy==0) o << s << "  X dimension:" << std::endl;
00092     else      o << s << "  Y dimension:" << std::endl;
00093     for(unsigned layer(0);layer<4;layer++) {
00094       o << s << "   Layer " << layer
00095         << ", efficiency = " << std::setw(4) << _cEffic[xy][layer]
00096         << ", noise rate = " << std::setw(4) << _cNoise[xy][layer] << "/mm"
00097         << ", smearing = " << std::setw(4) << _cSmear[xy][layer] << "mm"
00098         << ", t0 = " << std::setw(4) << _tTzero[xy][layer] << "ns"
00099         << std::endl;
00100     }
00101   }
00102 
00103   return o;
00104 }
